mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_email, user_password, user_nickname, user_name, user_mobile, user_gender, user_birth, user_address, user_role) VALUES (#{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_name}, #{user_mobile}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_address}, #{user_role})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_nickname, u.user_address, u.user_role,u.created_at FROM users u
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_name = #{user_name}, user_nickname =#{user_nickname}, user_address =#{user_address}, user_info=#{user_info} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
